name: Aegypt Slots Casino
description:
******** Free Egypt Slots Game! **********

****** Action-packed slot machine fun ******

Unearth the treasures of ancient Egypt in this brand new and exciting slot game!

This game provides an amazing hands-on experience, bringing the excitement of casino to your iPhone, iPod touch and iPad by transforming your device into a feature-packed slot machine. Pulling the Slots dock lever brings home the thrill of the casino, providing in-app reel-spinning action.

The app features multiple slots games of varying levels of difficulty to challenge your skills. This game delivers the look and feel of some of the world’s finest casinos, featuring rich graphics that create a vibrant and true-to-life gaming experience.

With high quality graphics and themes, you'll have fun playing for hours on end.

Features:

* Huge Bonuses Daily

Be the richest pharaoh in slot history!

Download FREE Today!
